channel.title: Home on rprp's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Home on rprp's blog

item.title: Resume
item.description:
wrp-wrp #

Undergraduate Student, CS (Turing Class) @ HUST
GitHub | Email

Education #

Huazhong University of Science and Technology (HUST)
B.Eng. in Computer Science and Technology (Turing Class)
Sept. 2023 – Present

Research Interests #

Database Systems, Approximate Nearest Neighbor Search (ANNS), Streaming Algorithms, Vector Indexes.

Research Experience #

Research Assistant | Database Group (Prof. Shuhao Zhang), HUST
Nov. 2024 – Present

  • Investigating ANNS in streaming scenarios; identified recall degradation caused by data distribution shifts.
  • Contributed to a benchmark paper on streaming vector search (4th Author, under review at SIGMOD).
  • Proposed a novel optimization for graph-based ANNS to address high update overhead and connectivity issues; currently drafting the paper and conducting experiments.
  • Developed high-performance C++ systems for vector stream processing.

Research Intern | Prof. Yao Wan’s Lab, HUST
Jan. 2024 – Mar. 2024

item.title: 计算理论学习笔记
item.description: 计算理论核心概念复习，涵盖自动机、可计算性与计算复杂性理论。

item.title: 计算机网络按层复习
item.description: 按网络层次（物理/链路/网络/传输/应用）整理的计算机网络复习笔记，包含常见物理层线路编码与调制简介。

item.title: About
item.description:
rprp · wrp-wrp #

he/him — A student from Huazhong University of Science and Technology. I compete in ACM contests (ICPC regional Au) and currently focus on research for approximate nearest neighbor search (ANNS) algorithms and database systems.

I use this space to document:

  • Ideas and notes from algorithm competitions
  • Research progress on ANNS and related systems
  • Personal experiments around performance engineering and infrastructure

If any of the posts spark questions or collaboration ideas, feel free to reach out via GitHub.
